PersonalStatement.text: Paul White, born on 1977-01-22, is a Male based in Port Brandy, Luxembourg. He is Divorced and holds Mexican nationality. Currently working at Reed-Hicks.

WorkExperience.text: Research Scientist at Anderson, Galvan and White from 2008 to 2020.
Senior Software Developer at Reed-Hicks, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Syracuse University
Master's in Engineering from National University of Life and Environmental Sciences of Ukraine

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys playing tennis.
